title: Please help; PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Hi I've had an issue for the past 2 weeks with league; it won't work (It was working about a month ago when I last played). When I attempt to open the launcher, it comes up with: "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working". I have googled possible solutions such as deleting the logs+ other stuff you need to delete; I have run it in compatibility mode with windows xp service pack 3 and have run it with administrator. I have looked at over 40 different links and I'm running low on patience and hope. I was hoping somebody could help me as I am technologically retarded. I have windows 7. If you need any more information about my laptop, teach me how I find out that info first and I will be happy to share all my specs. Thank you :)

replies.body:
First, read and keep an eye on [this discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/qGggBnHi-lol-client-crash-may-22nd). But yours doesn't sound *quite* like what's happening there.

Could you run dxdiag and show us what comes up on the Display tab? To do that, hit Winkey+R, then type "dxdiag" and hit Enter. Then, go to the Display tab. Either screen-shot it or just write what comes up there here.

I'd rather wait until Riot have fixed the store-related client crash first, as this might just be some collateral damage from that.

Thanks for your comment, here is an image of my dxdiag display.
http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2yzj0w3&s=8#.VV8zafmqqko
I'm sorry, but I don't like to click random links on the internet. Could you either A.) Quote what it says via text or B.) Use the built-in image uploader.
